subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tyreke Evans hit a pull-up jumper from 17 feet with 1.2 seconds left and the host New Orleans Pelicans beat the Portland Trail Blazers, 110-108.
snippet: Tyreke Evans hit a pull-up jumper from 17 feet with 1.2 seconds left and the host New Orleans Pelicans beat the Portland Trail Blazers, 110-108.
